responsibilities: Co-taught 9th and 10th-grade General Science and Biology classes, developing and executing lesson plans for diverse learner groups.
Utilized differentiated instruction techniques to support students with IEPs and 504 plans in a classroom of 30+ students.
Facilitated weekly laboratory sessions, ensuring adherence to safety protocols and hands-on engagement with curriculum materials.
Managed classroom behavior through positive reinforcement strategies and clear expectation setting.
Led interactive science demonstrations and workshops for high-school-aged visitors during summer programs.
Assisted in the curriculum development of Earth Science modules for community outreach initiatives.
Collaborated with senior educators to evaluate the effectiveness of educational programs through student feedback surveys.
